Articles.Content: Maybe this is just the hype, but everyone seems to be going on about how the update will mean relearning the game. Will the update come with some sort of guide? For instance, I would have never guessed that the LV-N will now use only LF and no oxidizer if I hadn't stumbled across that bit here in the forums. Likewise, I will have no idea what launch profile to use (i.e. when to do gravity turn) with he new aero. I guess part of the fun will be in experimenting with these things, but will there be any help?
I am looking forward to seeing the new 1.0 tutorials.

See the full feature list and changelog in the [1.0 Grand Discussion thread.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116772-The-KSP-1-0-Grand-Discussion-Thread-Conquering-Space-Was-Never-This-Easy%21)
